column4: hey all, i'm new to ubuntu. i run apt-get update and upgrade and it's telling me it's holding back a linux-image-server package. is this a package to update the kernel? if so how do i get it to apply these packages.
I don't really know how it works myself, but earlier this week I needed to run it in order for the kernel to update
oh, my bad, then. I assumed you were on Jaunty. Sorry
